parameters.name: AwsAccountId
parameters.description: The ID of the Amazon Web Services account that contains the theme that you're describing.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the theme.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name that the user gives to the theme.

nested_items.name: ThemeId
nested_items.description: The identifier that the user gives to the theme.

nested_items.name: VersionNumber
nested_items.description: The version number of the theme.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description of the theme.

nested_items.name: BaseThemeId
nested_items.description: The Amazon QuickSight-defined ID of the theme that a custom theme inherits from. All themes initially inherit from a default Amazon QuickSight theme.

nested_items.name: CreatedTime
nested_items.description: The date and time that this theme version was created.

nested_items.name: Configuration
nested_items.description: The theme configuration, which contains all the theme display properties.

nested_items.name: DataColorPalette
nested_items.description: Color properties that apply to chart data colors.

nested_items.name: Colors
nested_items.description: The hexadecimal codes for the colors.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: MinMaxGradient
nested_items.description: The minimum and maximum hexadecimal codes that describe a color gradient.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: EmptyFillColor
nested_items.description: The hexadecimal code of a color that applies to charts where a lack of data is highlighted.

nested_items.name: UIColorPalette
nested_items.description: Color properties that apply to the UI and to charts, excluding the colors that apply to data.

nested_items.name: PrimaryForeground
nested_items.description: The color of text and other foreground elements that appear over the primary background regions, such as grid lines, borders, table banding, icons, and so on.

nested_items.name: PrimaryBackground
nested_items.description: The background color that applies to visuals and other high emphasis UI.

nested_items.name: SecondaryForeground
nested_items.description: The foreground color that applies to any sheet title, sheet control text, or UI that appears over the secondary background.

nested_items.name: SecondaryBackground
nested_items.description: The background color that applies to the sheet background and sheet controls.

nested_items.name: Accent
nested_items.description: This color is that applies to selected states and buttons.

nested_items.name: AccentForeground
nested_items.description: The foreground color that applies to any text or other elements that appear over the accent color.

nested_items.name: Danger
nested_items.description: The color that applies to error messages.

nested_items.name: DangerForeground
nested_items.description: The foreground color that applies to any text or other elements that appear over the error color.

nested_items.name: Warning
nested_items.description: This color that applies to warning and informational messages.

nested_items.name: WarningForeground
nested_items.description: The foreground color that applies to any text or other elements that appear over the warning color.

nested_items.name: Success
nested_items.description: The color that applies to success messages, for example the check mark for a successful download.

nested_items.name: SuccessForeground
nested_items.description: The foreground color that applies to any text or other elements that appear over the success color.

nested_items.name: Dimension
nested_items.description: The color that applies to the names of fields that are identified as dimensions.

nested_items.name: DimensionForeground
nested_items.description: The foreground color that applies to any text or other elements that appear over the dimension color.

nested_items.name: Measure
nested_items.description: The color that applies to the names of fields that are identified as measures.

nested_items.name: MeasureForeground
nested_items.description: The foreground color that applies to any text or other elements that appear over the measure color.

nested_items.name: Show
nested_items.description: The option to enable display of borders for visuals.

nested_items.name: TileLayout
nested_items.description: The layout options for tiles.

nested_items.name: Show
nested_items.description: This Boolean value controls whether to display a gutter space between sheet tiles.

nested_items.name: Show
nested_items.description: This Boolean value controls whether to display sheet margins.

nested_items.name: Typography
nested_items.description: Determines the typography options.

nested_items.name: FontFamilies
nested_items.description: Determines the list of font families.

nested_items.name: FontFamily
nested_items.description: Determines the font family settings.

nested_items.name: Errors
nested_items.description: Errors associated with the theme.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The type of error.

nested_items.name: Message
nested_items.description: The error message.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the theme version.

nested_items.name: CreatedTime
nested_items.description: The date and time that the theme was created.

nested_items.name: LastUpdatedTime
nested_items.description: The date and time that the theme was last updated.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The type of theme, based on how it was created. Valid values include: QUICKSIGHT and CUSTOM.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The HTTP status of the request.

nested_items.name: RequestId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services request ID for this operation.
